manual.description: vilistextum is a html to ascii converter specifically programmed to get the best out of incorrect html.

option.shortdesc: replace inputfile with '-' for reading from standard input, likewise outputfile with '-' for writing to standard output.
don't output anything for IMG tags even if they have an ALT attribute. Implies --no-image.
some tags will be converted to special characters.
option.longdesc: Some of the tags will be converted to special characters. Eg: "Bold isn't like italic, isn't like underlined, isn't like emphasized, but is like strong." will be output as "*Bold* isn't /italic/ isn't _underlined_ isn't /emphasized/ but is like *strong*."

option.shortdesc: increase level of verbosity for error messages (0: No error messages).
option.longdesc:
Increase level of verbosity for error messages.
0: No error messages
1: Show unrecognized entities
2: Show unknown tags
>2: Mostly debugging information

option.shortdesc: IMG tags without alt attribute are output as [STRING].
option.longdesc: IMG tags without alt attribute are output as [STRING]. Default: Image.

option.shortdesc: numbers the links in the document and creates footnotes of each link at the end of the file.
option.longdesc: Numbers the links in the document and creates footnotes of each link at the end of the file. Similar to 'lynx -dump'. Relative URIs are not resolved and won't be printed.

option.shortdesc: don't convert the entities from windows1252 (€-Ÿ and their proper entity names)
option.longdesc: The entities from windows1252 (€ - Ÿ and their proper entitiy names) will not be converted.

option.shortdesc: don't output [Image] for IMG tags that have no ALT attribute.
output text more suitable for reading on a PDA.
option.longdesc: This outputs text more suitable for reading on a PDA. Palm textreader do their own wordwrapping, so the width is set to infinity and the program doesn't rightjustify or center the text.

option.shortdesc: if there is an empty ALT attribute in a IMG tag (eg ), don't output '[]'.
if there are more than NUMBER empty lines, output only NUMBER. Default: 1.
option.longdesc: If there are more than number empty lines, output only NUMBER. Default: 1.
Don't output title of the HTML document
Maximum width of the output text. Default: 72.

paragraph.name: LIMITATIONS
paragraph.subparagraph: The rendering of tables is not very good.
The handling of OL is incomplete. The program treats it as UL and more than 10 nested lists confuse it.
